content.text:
# Rajeshwar Tiwari

Rajeshwar Tiwari is an Indian bridge player. He competed at both the 2018 Asian Games and the 2022 Asian Games, winning bronze in the former and silver in the latter. Tiwari also played in  for India at the 2023 Bridge Federation of Asia and Middle East Championships, where his team won gold.
Aside from playing bridge, Tiwari works as an IT professional.
